edu.ucla.sspace.mains

Class OptionDescriptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.mains.OptionDescriptions

  • public final class OptionDescriptions
extends Object
    A utility class that contains string descriptions of differnt command line options. Classes that are designed to execute a SemanticSpace algorithm are encouraged to use this class to generate option descriptions for their help messages.

    All return strings are formatted to fit in under 80 columns of text and are not terminated with a newline. The descriptions do not contain any option specification (e.g. -g, --compoundWords) themselves; the calling code will need to specify how these behaviors are invoked.

    See Also:
    GenericMain
